body:
Comment 3 by **jon.forums**: 
Build passes on Win8 64bit with mingw-w64 gcc 4.8.0:

C:\Apps\go-hg\src>gcc --version
gcc (rev2, Built by MinGW-builds project) 4.8.0

...

# ..\misc\cgo\stdio

# ..\misc\cgo\test
ok      _/C_/Apps/go-hg/misc/cgo/test   1.137s

...

ALL TESTS PASSED

---
Installed Go for windows/amd64 in C:\Apps\go-hg
Installed commands in C:\Apps\go-hg\bin
